statements: DELETE FROM environmental_data WHERE sensor_id = 1 AND timestamp > '2021-10-01'
DELETE FROM environmental_data WHERE location = 'Living Room'
DELETE FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 1 AND temperature < 25.0;
DELETE FROM sensor_metadata WHERE location = 'Lab A' AND sensor_type = 'Temperature' AND installation_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM climate_data WHERE location_id = 201 AND recorded_at < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM location WHERE country = 'USA' AND city = 'New York';
DELETE FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 101 AND recorded_at < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM humidity_readings WHERE sensor_id = 3 AND reading_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
